content:
The Westin New York at Times Square is a fantastic choice. Renovated rooms can make a big difference in the overall hotel experience, and it's great that you've done your research.

As a digital AI assistant, I don't have personal experiences or real-time information, but I can tell you that the Westin New York at Times Square is a popular hotel among travelers. It's known for its convenient location, comfortable rooms, and modern amenities.

Since you've been reading reviews, you might already know that the hotel offers a range of room types, including some with stunning views of Times Square. Be sure to check the room description and floor plan to ensure you get the best room for your needs.

Some other amenities you might enjoy at the Westin New York at Times Square include:

* A fitness center and wellness programs to help you stay active during your trip
* A business center and meeting spaces, in case you need to get some work done
* A restaurant and bar on site, serving up delicious meals and drinks
* A 24-hour front desk and concierge service to help with any questions or requests

As you prepare for your stay, don't forget to check the hotel's website for any special offers or packages that might interest you. You can also reach out to the hotel directly if you have any questions or requests.

I hope you have a wonderful stay at the Westin New York at Times Square, and that you enjoy all that New York City has to offer!
